attributes.action: 'To publicly acknowledge that there is a massive discipline problem in many State Schools and to give teachers and Headteachers the necessary powers to enforce discipline and to deal effectively with problem pupils and their parents.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition from the education blogger Frank Chalk to try and improve the appalling level of discipline in many State Schools.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To publicly acknowledge that there is a massive discipline problem in many State Schools and to give teachers and Headteachers the necessary powers to enforce discipline and to deal effectively with problem pupils and their parents."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11171.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/frankchalk3/
